name: Geology,orRockyFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask rocky facts to tell me more”
”Alexa, open rocky facts”
”tell me more”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rocky facts
des:
Geology, or Rocky Facts

This skill will respond with fun facts and trivia relating to Geology, especially rocks and the rocky structure of the earth.

You can say: 
Alexa, ask rocky facts to tell me more
Alexa, ask rocky facts for some trivia
Alexa, ask rocky facts for a fun fact
Alexa, ask rocky facts to tell me some trivia

Alexa, open rocky facts and tell me more

or

Alexa, open pipe organ facts
about | about rocky facts | about geology
what is rocky facts | what is geology
help | help with this
wait
bye | good bye | that's all | that's all folks
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
